sections.heading: lands; leases; covenant required
sections.text: All leases executed after May 3, 1935, with respect to educational lands shall contain a covenant to the effect that no prairie lands shall be broken without written permission authorized by the Board of Educational Lands and Funds.SourceLaws 1935, c. 163, § 16, p. 6

72-246.School lands; leases; covenant required.

All leases executed after May 3, 1935, with respect to educational lands shall contain a covenant to the effect that no prairie lands shall be broken without written permission authorized by the Board of Educational Lands and Funds.

SourceLaws 1935, c. 163, § 16, p. 609;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 72-223;R.S.1943, § 72-246;Laws 1999, LB 779, § 41.
